items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: IndiGo, IndusInd Bank, Colgate, NALCO, Hindustan Zinc, NBCC, Aarti Industries, Birlasoft, MGL, Oil India in focus on 22 May
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 22 May: Stocks like NBCC (India), Jindal Poly Films,Hindustan Zinc,Data Patterns (India), Zinka Logistics Solutions, KPR Mill, Aarti Industries, Birlasoft, Hindustan Copper, Mahanagar Gas, Piramal Enterprises, InterGlobe Aviation, IndusInd Bank, Colgate Palmolive (India), National Aluminium Company, and Oil India will be in focus on May 22.

items.title: Whirlpool puts up a decent show amid parent’s stake sale overhang
items.description: Promoter Whirlpool Corp plans to lower its stake in Whirlpool India to 20 percent this year

items.title: Indigo — Will the airline’s performance continue to fly high?
items.description: Increased cancellations due to geopolitical tension likely to impact yields in Q1 FY26

items.title: Agri Picks Report May 22, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, The sowing of summer crops in Maharashtra reached 510,539 hectares as of Monday, up 20% on year from 424,345 hectares sown in the same period last year, according to a report released by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Repco Home Finance: Sustained loan growth to drive re-rating
items.description: Loan growth, asset quality improvement on the cards
